articles.title: Parker Solar Probe reveals secrets of the solar wind, which sparks geomagnetic storms on Earth - HT Tech
articles.description: The data obtained from Parker Solar Probe has helped scientists to better understand Solar wind speed and this may help in predicting solar eruptions and understanding geomagnetic storms.
articles.content: Scientists have made a groundbreaking discovery about the solar wind, revealing how it reaches extraordinary speeds exceeding 1 million miles per hour. The findings, published in the journal Nature, … [+2314 chars]
